messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
You and I!Let us create a scene!
A fantastic tableau of battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Magnificent!
I am aglow with inspiration!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
That battle will surely become a
stupendous masterpiece painting!I shall title it...“My Pokémon Is Fight”!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
The key to becoming a good painter
is to be observant.That is the same for battling.
One must be observant!
